problem.p: In the image above, a large block rests on a flat plane. The large block has a pulley attached. A second block sits on top of the large block, and a rope runs from it, over the pulley, down to a third block that hangs from the pulley and touches the large block.
There is no friction on any surface. The system is arranged as shown and then released.
Which systems will not be accelerating in the horizontal direction?

choicegroup.choice: A system composed of block 1 and block 2.
A system composed of block 1 and block 3.
A system composed of block 2 and block 3.
A system composed of all three blocks.
Every possible system of these blocks will be accelerating.

problem.p: Which systems will not be accelerating in the vertical direction?

choicegroup.choice: A system composed of block 1 and block 2.
A system composed of block 1 and block 3.
A system composed of block 2 and block 3.
A system composed of all three blocks.
Every possible system of these blocks will be accelerating.
